item1.company: Gained as Research Scientist at University of Cádiz
item1.description1: Present information clear and concisely as demonstrated by developing medical writing projects which led to obtain 2+ budget funding.
item1.description2: Higly experienced in data collection, analysis and effective communication to make informed decisions resulting in 4+ scientific publications.
item1.description3: Strategic decision making, budget management and interdepartamental collaboration proven by the realization of my PhD Project with <30.000€.

item2.company: Gained as Junior Scientist at INiBICA, Cádiz
item2.description1: Excellent leadership skills,developing improvements in teaching processes proven by coaching and mentoring 7+ junior colleages as evidenced the goals achieved in a shorter period of time/
item2.description2: Strong teamwork ethic with proven ability to build prolific collaborations resulting in 2 peer-reviewed scientific publications.
item2.description3: Outstanding adaptability skills and experience meeting customer needs by proving simultaneous support to 4 clinical departments with innovate solutions.

item3.company: Gained as Research Associate at University of Granada
item3.description1: High level strategic planner with experience managing 3+ projects of diverse nature resulting in the development of 1 external collaboration
item3.description2: Conflict management in a fast-paced environment proved by working 1+ year in a multidisciplinary team with 20+ members and several departments.
item3.description3: Effective organization, meeting deadlines and expectations proved by the collaboration with 3+ departments in parallel.

about.title: About me
about.item1: - Professional web application development specialized in the frontend with the React JS library.
about.item2: - Currently I am working on the development of web applications with React JS and Node JS.
about.item3: - Other technologies I'm looking forward to learn are TypeScript, GraphQL and MongoDB. I would also like to learn how to use the React Native library for mobile app development.
